name: OperationQueue
desc: A queue that regulates the execution of operations.

items.name: main
items.desc: Returns the operation queue associated with the main thread.

items.name: current
items.desc: Returns the operation queue that launched the current operation.

items.name: addOperation
items.desc: Adds the specified operation to the receiver.

items.name: addOperations
items.desc: Adds the specified operations to the queue.

items.name: operations
items.desc: The operations currently in the queue.

items.name: operationCount
items.desc: The number of operations currently in the queue.

items.name: cancelAllOperations
items.desc: Cancels all queued and executing operations.

items.name: waitUntilAllOperationsAreFinished
items.desc: Blocks the current thread until all of the receiverâ€™s queued and executing operations finish executing.

items.name: qualityOfService
items.desc: The default service level to apply to operations executed using the queue.

items.name: maxConcurrentOperationCount
items.desc: The maximum number of queued operations that can execute at the same time.

items.name: defaultMaxConcurrentOperationCount
items.desc: The default maximum number of operations to be executed concurrently in a queue.

items.name: isSuspended
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the queue is actively scheduling operations for execution.

items.name: name
items.desc: The name of the operation queue.

items.name: underlyingQueue
items.desc: The dispatch queue used to execute operations.
